bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with feng leng 風冷 , wind cold. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 21 refers to a gymnastics as being capable of: 除腹肚冷風 , “eliminating cold wind from the abdomen”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 refers to the following pathological conditions associated with cold wind: leng feng wan bi 冷風頑痹 , cold wind with stubborn blockage; leng feng tan huan 冷風癱緩 , cold wind with paralysis and slackening; leng feng ma bi 冷風麻痹 , cold wind with hemp[-like numbness] blockage.
